compatibility.notes: When distributing derived works, you must provide the corresponding source code and modifications made to the original work.

key_requirements: The source code of any modified versions must be made available to the community.
Operators of network servers must provide access to the source code of modified versions running on their servers.
license.name: AGPL-3.0-or-later
obligations: The operator of a network server must provide the source code of the modified version running there to the users of that server.
When you distribute copies of a program, whether in object code or translated form, one of the following is required:
- You provide a copy of this License along with the program.
- You give anyone who receives a copy the information that the program is distributed under this License.
